Vatican City: Latin and Italian

Liechtenstein: German

Andorra: Catalan and Spanish
chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content:
The official languages of the five smallest countries in Europe by land area are as follows:

1. Monaco - French
2. San Marino - Italian
3. Vatican City - Latin and Italian
4. Liechtenstein - German
5. Andorra - Catalan and Spanish

You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
